trans-unit.source: Represents a statement that removes an event handler.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en setning som fjerner hendelsesbehandling.

trans-unit.source: CodeRemoveEventStatement can be used to represent a statement that removes an event handler for an event.
trans-unit.target: CodeRemoveEventStatement kan brukes til å representere en setning som fjerner hendelsesbehandling for en hendelse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeRemoveEventStatement.Event%2A> property specifies the event to remove the event handler from.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeRemoveEventStatement.Event%2A>egenskapen angir hendelsen for å fjerne hendelsesbehandlingen fra.</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeRemoveEventStatement.Event%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeRemoveEventStatement.Listener%2A> property specifies the event handler to remove.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeRemoveEventStatement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeRemoveEventStatement"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeRemoveEventStatement"></xref> class with the specified event and event handler.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeRemoveEventStatement"> </xref> klassen med hendelsen og hendelsesbehandlingen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression"></xref> that indicates the event to detach the event handler from.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression"> </xref> som angir hendelse til å koble fra hendelsesbehandlingen fra.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the event handler to remove.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref> som angir hendelsesbehandlingen fjerne.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeRemoveEventStatement"></xref> class using the specified target object, event name, and event handler.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeRemoveEventStatement"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av det angitte målobjektet hendelsesnavn og hendelsesbehandlingen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the object that contains the event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref> som angir objektet som inneholder hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the event handler to remove.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref> som angir hendelsesbehandlingen fjerne.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the event to remove a listener from.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hendelsen for å fjerne en lytter fra.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression"></xref> that indicates the event to remove a listener from.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression"> </xref> som angir hendelse til å fjerne en lytter fra.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the event handler to remove.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the event handler to remove.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref> som angir hendelsesbehandlingen fjerne.
